<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> posNoAVX512F =</Highlight></CodeLine>

FS.size() - 8 : FS.rfind(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;-avx512f,&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
